name: header-multi-value-ebay
readme:
header-multi-value-ebay
=======================

Header Multi Value Parameters Create and Parsing Module

# Installation

```Shell
npm install header-multi-value-ebay --save
```

# Usage

```Javascript
var multivalue = require('header-multi-value-ebay');
var helloWorld = multivalue.create({'hello': 'world'}); /**Produces Hello=World**/
```

# API

## Create MultiValue

Creates a MultiValue object for the input.

```Javascript
var multivalue = require('header-multi-value-ebay');
var helloWorld = multivalue.create({'hello': 'world'});
console.log(helloWorld.toString());/**Produces Hello=World**/
```

## Parse MultiValue

Parse a MultiValue Object

```Javascript

var provider = require('header-multi-value-ebay');
var helloWorld = provider.parse('Hello=World');
console.log(helloWorld.get('Hello')); // Prints World

```
